about_the_game:
Welcome to SHOTBALL , the chaotic fusion of football and explosive combat. Armed with your

trusty shotgun and a set of wild abilities, you'll team up in intense 3v3 matches to outscore

your rivals. With advanced movement and customizable loadouts, every match is a chance to forge your path to victory!

Key Features :

Shoot Everything!

In Shotball, your shotgun is your best friend. Blast the ball across the field to set up the

perfect goal, knock your opponents off their game, or even send your teammates flying to

reposition them in an instant. Every shot counts, so aim wisely... or shoot wildly!

Master Advanced Movement

Precision and speed are key to dominating the field. Jump, Slide and Wall-ride to outplay

your opponents and reach the perfect position. The field is your playground, and your

movement skills will make or break your game!

Unleash Wild Abilities

Turn the tide of the match with powerful abilities designed to disrupt, defend, and dominate.

Whether you're teleporting around the field, shielding your team, or causing explosive chaos,

your abilities can change the game in an instant. Use them strategically to gain the upper hand!

Customize Your Loadout

Play your way by choosing from a variety of abilities, weapons, and playstyles to build your

ultimate loadout. Whether you prefer to focus on scoring, supporting your team, or pure

destruction, the choice is yours. Adapt your strategy and find the perfect synergy to lead your team to victory!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11 (64 bit-version only)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 1200, intel core i5 4460
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1080, Radeon RX 5700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
